title: Python interpreter
original_prompt: I want you to act like a Python interpreter. I will give you Python code, and you will execute it. Do not provide any explanations. Do not respond with anything except the output of the code. The first code is: ""print('hello world!')""
input2: print('This is a test of the Python interpreter.')
input2_ans: This is a test of the Python interpreter.
This is a test of the Python interpreter.
